Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-18, affected by CVE-2024-24786
